class.name: ColorContrastHelper
class.summary: Contrast Helper to help get level and get best color.

method.name: GetContrast
method.summary: Returns the color (black or white) that has the highest contrast ratio with the given background color, along with the contrast ratio itself. You may optionally specify a minimum WCAG contrast ratio threshold.
method.returns: True if contrast meets the minimum threshold, false otherwise

param.name: bestContrastColor
param.summary: Returns black or white depending on best contrast

method.name: ContrastRatio
method.summary: Returns the WCAG contrast ratio between two luminances.

method.name: RelativeLuminance
method.summary: Returns the relative luminance of a color (0–1).

method.name: ChannelLuminance
method.summary: Applies gamma correction to a single RGB channel (0–255).
